level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-85
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-85, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-301.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-371
level.text: For history of Law 18-371, see notes under § 2-301.01.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Pursuant to § 101(ff) of D.C. Law 11-259, which enacted Subpart B. Part B, 2001 Ed. of this subchapter, consisting of §§ 1-1188.7 through 1-1188.12 §§ 2-308.07 through 2-308.12, 2001 Ed., the preexisting provisions of this subchapter were designated as Subpart A of Part A, 2001 Ed.
